tasks.label: wait-for-jdwp-5005
args:
# Wait up to 60 seconds for TCP port 5005 to become available
for i in {1..120}; do
  if (echo > /dev/tcp/127.0.0.1/5005) >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo 'JDWP port 5005 is open'
    exit 0
  fi
  sleep 0.5
done
echo 'Timed out waiting for JDWP port 5005' >&2
exit 1
